Name: De Blauwe Druif
Review Text: Seriously love this store. Always helpful and kind, knowledgeable people in the shop, and they really create lovely gifts when you need one in a pinch. Go here for some good beer and wine selections as well as some hard to find hard liquor.

Name: De Blauwe Druif
Review Text: Very wide selection for a reasonable price. The people there know what they're talking about. Although being a advertised as a wine vendor you can get everything drink related here. An important part of the store for instance is the carft ‚Ä¶
